binding:binding.name: Nest Binding
binding:binding.description: This is the binding for Nest connects to the nest cloud and allows control of the various nest devices.
binding:binding.author: David Bennett

parameter.name: client_id
parameter.label: Client id
parameter.description: The client id from the nest product page

parameter.name: client_secret
parameter.label: Client secret
parameter.description: The client secret from the nest product page

parameter.name: pincode
parameter.label: Pincode
parameter.description: The pincode to use after clicking on the authorization url

parameter.name: refresh_interval
parameter.label: Refresh Interval
parameter.description: How often to refresh the data from nest (in seconds). Don't make this too often or nest will throttle your account.
